programme.title: Brothers of the West
programme.desc: Detective Tom Wade (Tom Tyler) has to investigate the truth behind a robbery and murder of a bank president that's being blamed on Tom's brother, Ed (Bob Terry), who is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: The Diamond Trail
programme.desc: A New York reporter (Rex Bell) follows a gang of gem smugglers west.

programme.title: Gunsmoke Ranch
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers (Bob Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune) stop a land swindler out to profit from a flood.

programme.title: Hellgate
programme.desc: After the Civil War, ranch owner Gil Hanley helps a stranger in desperate need of medical attention. Soon he is questioned by Union soldiers about the stranger, who turns out to be an ex-Confederate soldier.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie, Lofty and Tagg (Gail Davis, Brad Johnson, Jimmy Hawkins) step in when a store owner is killed and his young daughter is left blind. With Judy Nugent.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie becomes suspicious of Elaine Forbes, the seemingly innocent niece of a recently deceased rancher.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Outlaw Vic Carver (Robert B. Williams) seeks revenge against Sheriff MacTavish (Kenneth MacDonald) for sending him to jail.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) races to save her retired mentor (Stanley Andrews) from a suicide mission with a merciless young gunman. With Ric Vallin.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie and Tagg (Gail Davis, Jimmy Hawkins) track a masked bandit who holds up an acrobatic troupe. With Brad Johnson.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) plays matchmaker for her friend Bess Murdock (Nancy Hale). With Don Kennedy, Brad Johnson.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie relies on Tagg's ability as a ventriloquist to save an innocent stage driver from angry townspeople.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tagg (Jimmy Hawkins) and his friend Billy (Stuffy Singer) run away to a ghost town inhabited by an outlaw gang. With Gail Davis.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie uses the town's new fire engine to capture some bank robbers who are hiding in a shack near town.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) investigates when a young dance teacher has a seemingly ironclad alibi for a series of crimes. With Lou Smith, Sue Smith.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A young doctor (David Alpert) faces a moral dilemma when asked to treat the escaped convict (Gregg Barton) who killed his father (Stanley Andrews).

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: An injured rancher summons all his strength to help Annie and Lofty when outlaws hold his wife hostage.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A stageline driver is framed in the looting of strongboxes by the stageline owner and freighter.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: After a woman is wrongfully jailed, Cisco and Pancho plan to trap the real murderer.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho prove that an office manager and his followers are murderers.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A gambler's thugs beat up a crusading newspaperman.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A dog leads Cisco and Pancho to his murdered master's gold mine where they become trapped by the victim's killers.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco proves that the man being held in jail on a murder charge is not the actual murderer.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A respectable businessman traps an elderly man into a rustling ring scheme that Pancho and Cisco later discover.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho set out to prove that a notorious outlaw has murdered a U.S. marshal.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho capture a notorious bank robber after falling for a trap set by the criminal's sister.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho attempt to convince a freighting company owner that her competitor did not steal from her wagons.

programme.title: The Over-the-Hill Gang
programme.desc: A retired Texas Ranger (Pat O'Brien) summons three old-timers to help him clean up Boulder.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: A baseball star (Lou Gehrig) goes west with his sister (Evalyn Knapp) and helps a lawyer (Smith Ballew) bust a cattle-protection racket.

programme.title: The Star Packer
programme.desc: Marshal John Travers investigates the murder of a town's sheriff, makes it his mission to restore order to the town and bring down a bandit called the Shadow.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Texas brothers (Robert Preston, Robert Sterling) feud over land and cattle, with a younger brother between them.

programme.title: The Painted Desert
programme.desc: A tungsten miner (Bill Boyd) loves his father's rival's daughter (Helen Twelvetrees) and fights off her other suitor (Clark Gable).

programme.title: The Courageous Avenger
programme.desc: A law officer tries to bring a traitorous mine foreman to justice.

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A boy raised by his servant vows to take revenge on the ranchers who killed his parents.
